title: Superman - The Complete John Byrne Era
description:
"In 1986, in the wake of Crisis on Infinite Earths, DC chose John Byrne to helm the reboot of the Superman titles. Byrne was the popular artist of MarvelÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s The Uncanny X-Men, which he had often co-plotted with writer Chris Claremont. Also notable for his legendary run on Fantastic Four. Now, Byrne was given the privilege of remaking Superman, adapting the character for the 1980s."


Included in this torrent is the complete John Byrne Era which ran though Superman, Action Comics, Adventures of Superman and various one shots and mini-series' from 1986-1988. All annuals and related issues are accounted for and placed in the proper reading order according to in continuity chronology. (to add a more complete feel to the run I took the liberty of including the Wolfman/Ordway Adventures of Superman issues which ran from #424-435)

-Man of Steel
-Superman
-Action Comics
-Adventures of Superman
-World of Krypton
-World of Smallville
-World of Metropolis
-The Earth Stealers
